resources:
FinalProject
//Strings for Deezer Song Search API in american English Song Search HELP Enter Artist's Name: Name SEARCH FAVORITES
App Instructions "Type an artist's name into the text box and click the 'Search' button to get a list of their songs.

" "You may click on any of the songs in the list to get more details about them.

" "On the details page you can add a song to your favorites. 

" "The 'Favorites' button can be used to view songs saved to your favorites.

" "Clicking on any of the songs in this list will also provide you with details.

" "In the favorites list do a long click to open up a window where you can remove the song from your favorites." Close Do you want to remove this song from favorites? The song selected is by Yes No Search Complete!
"Title: " "Album: " "Duration: " ADD TO FAVORITES HIDE You have already favorited this song! by added to favorites!
Song Name Artist Name
